title: Exploring the dynamics and future projections of land use land cover changes by exploiting geospatial techniques; A case study of the Kabul River Basin
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Rahmatullah Wahdatyar, Muhammad Fahim Khokhar, Shakil Ahmad, Mohammad Uzair Rahil, Mohammad Ajmal Stanikzai, Junaid Aziz Khan, Kamran
